page.title: 13ANNUAL EVENT IN PILNING
page.content:
{Pilning Flower Show}
Pilning Flower Show is an annual event held in August in the Village Hall and run by the Hall Committee. There are 79 classes for judging including fruit, flowers, vegetables, flower arranging, preserves, wines, cakes, photography, needlework and 2 childrens sections. ll cups and small prizes are presented. Outside the hall in the playing fields, stalls and side shows are set up and disco music played. Entrance is l5p including programme. At the end exhibits are auctioned for the hall funds. Teas are provided by the wives of the cricket club.
